mapper.update: update admin_user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exts = #{exts,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
